title: TiKV is killed during profiling via TiDB-dashboard
body:

comments_data.body:
This problem is that: the timer still works after unregistering the signal handler. Then `tikv` received a `SIGPROF` and killed.

However, I have fixed this problem in `0.3.13`, which was published one year ago. And `tikv` used `pprof-rs 0.3.15` ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è . I will try to reproduce this problem and find the reason.
Failed to reproduce on my low spec virtual machine with tpch load. I guess the problem is because of the signals which haven't arrived yet.
